title: Fallin' 4 U
lyrics:
Is there any other way that I can love you
Other than fallin', fallin', fallin' for you, for you?
I never met nobody else above you
So I keep fallin', fallin, fallin' for you, for you
You push me up against the wall

I never felt nobody more than this before

I don't see no other way

Just to get a taste, sugar, I'd say anything



Maybe you can stay a while? 

I know we can take it higher



Is there any other way that I can love you

Other than fallin', fallin', fallin' for you, for you?

I never met nobody else above you

So I keep fallin', fallin, fallin' for you, for you



Fallin', fallin'

Fallin', fallin'

Fallin' for you



I just wanna shower you (yeah)

In kisses till your hissing, got nothin' to lose

So would you let me come inside?

Girl, you fill me up so full of pride (Hey, yeah)



Maybe you can stay a while? (Hey, yeah)

I know we can take it higher 



Is there any other way that I can love you

Other than fallin', fallin', fallin' for you, for you?

I never met nobody else above you (above you)

So I keep fallin', fallin, fallin' for you, for you (fallin' for you)



Fallin', fallin'

Fallin', fallin'

Fallin' for you (for you)

Fallin', fallin'

Fallin', fallin'

Fallin' for you (I am)



I feel like a plane fallin' from the sky

Every time you catch my eye

Girl, you know that every time I catch your eye

I feel like rain fallin' from the sky



Is there any other way that I can love you

Other than fallin', fallin', fallin' for you, for you?

I never met nobody else above you

So I keep fallin', fallin, fallin' for you, for you (ah,yeah)



Fallin', fallin'

Fallin', fallin'

Fallin' for you (hah ah, fallin' for you)

Fallin', fallin'

Fallin', fallin'

Fallin' for you



Yeah, you know I'm fallin' for you (I keep on fallin')

Shit, I am (fallin', I guess I keep on fallin' for you)

Ooh (I keep on fallin', fallin')

Oh you know that I'm fallin' for you, oh (fallin', I guess I keep on fallin' for you)
